title: Sister Joan Chittister: Two Words That Can Change the World
description: Life changing wisdom and insights from one of America’s key spiritual voices. Sister Joan Chittister is a Roman Catholic nun and author of over 50 books. She’s a tireless advocate of justice, peace and equality, especially for women, all over the world.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
